channel.description: Recent content in Typescript on Coding notes - and snippets

item.title: Minimal TypeScript Project Setup
item.description: Goal Set up a minimal TypeScript project from scratch. Create the project npm init -y npm install --save-dev typescript nano tsconfig.json { "compilerOptions": { "module": "commonjs", "esModuleInterop": true, "target": "es6", "moduleResolution": "node", "sourceMap": true, "outDir": "dist" }, "lib": ["es2015"] } Write your code nano src/app.ts Add your TypeScript code to src/app.ts. Compile and run npx tsc node dist/app.js
